title: Jandy VersaTemp Heat Pump — Guided Troubleshooting

s1.text: Is the unit powered ON (control board display active)?

check_power.text: Check breaker, fuses, and wiring. Restore power to unit.

s2.text: Is there a fault code displayed?

fault_branch.text: Refer to VersaTemp Fault/Error Codes for next steps.

check_contactors.text: Check compressor contactor, wiring, and capacitor. Replace faulty parts.

s4.text: Is the fan blowing air out the top of the unit?

check_fan.text: Check fan capacitor, motor, and wiring. Replace faulty components.

s5.text: After running 15+ minutes, is water heating?

check_refrigerant.text: Possible refrigerant issue. Check coil for frost/icing. Call licensed HVAC/pool heat tech.
